mapper.select: SELECT EXAM.UNO, EXAM.PNO, USER.UNAME, USER.NAME, PAPER.PNAME, RESULT, TIME, EXAMNO FROM EXAM, USER, PAPER WHERE EXAM.UNO = USER.UNO AND EXAM.PNO = PAPER.PNO LIMIT #{offset}, #{rows};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EXAM (UNO, PNO, NAME, RESULT, TIME) VALUES(#{exam.UNO}, #{exam.PNO}, #{exam.RESULT}, #{exam.TIME})
